# Full Circle Function & Fitness

> Personal training, massage therapy, and private yoga in Allison Park, PA (Pittsburgh North Hills). 4.9 stars on Google with 75+ reviews.

## Services
- Private Personal Training: One-on-one strength training starting at $69/session
- Semi-Private Personal Training: Small group training (1-4 people) starting at $52/session
- Massage Therapy: Swedish, neuromuscular, myofascial release, pregnancy massage. 60min $100, 90min $145, 120min $190
- Private Yoga: Forrest Yoga-based private sessions for 1-2 people. $90-$100/session
- Structural Bodywork: Myofascial release series for postural balance. $137.50-$159/session

## Location
4361 William Flinn Hwy, Allison Park, PA 15101
Phone: 412-295-7058
Email: cody@fullcirclefunctionandfitness.com
Hours: Monday-Friday 6am-8pm, By Appointment

## Staff
- Cody Bock, M.S., LMT — Owner, Personal Trainer & Licensed Massage Therapist
- Chris Reeves, M.S., CSCS — Personal Trainer
- Elaine Miller, B.S., CSCS — Personal Trainer
- Becca Cutright, LMT — Licensed Massage Therapist & Yoga Instructor
